name: Sky Puzzle
description:
This is a beautiful girl card game with fast memory as the core. Players need to quickly memorize among many beautiful cards to find the matching 2 cards and eliminate them. After eliminating all of them, the corresponding beautiful girl CG pictures can be unlocked. Let's start with the goal of collecting all the beautiful girls~

This game is operated with the mouse. Clicking on the card will turn it over. When the same card is turned over twice in a row, it will be eliminated.
